5#ifndef V8_CODEGEN_MACRO_ASSEMBLER_BASE_H_
6#define V8_CODEGEN_MACRO_ASSEMBLER_BASE_H_
7
8#include <memory>
9
10#include "src/base/template-utils.h"
11#include "src/builtins/builtins.h"
12#include "src/codegen/assembler-arch.h"
13#include "src/roots/roots.h"
14
15namespace v8 {
16namespace internal {
17
18// Common base class for platform-specific MacroAssemblers containing
19// platform-independent bits.
20// TODO(victorgomes): We should use LocalIsolate instead of Isolate in the
21// methods of this class.
22class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE MacroAssemblerBase : public Assembler {
23 public:
24 // Constructors are declared public to inherit them in derived classes
25 // with `using` directive.
26 MacroAssemblerBase(Isolate* isolate, CodeObjectRequired create_code_object,
27 std::unique_ptr<AssemblerBuffer> buffer = {})
28 : MacroAssemblerBase(isolate, AssemblerOptions::Default(isolate),
29 create_code_object, std::move(buffer)) {}
30
31 MacroAssemblerBase(Isolate* isolate, const AssemblerOptions& options,
32 CodeObjectRequired create_code_object,
33 std::unique_ptr<AssemblerBuffer> buffer = {});
34
35 Isolate* isolate() const { return isolate_; }
36
37 Handle<HeapObject> CodeObject() const {
38 DCHECK(!code_object_.is_null());
39 return code_object_;
40 }
41
42 bool root_array_available() const { return root_array_available_; }
43 void set_root_array_available(bool v) { root_array_available_ = v; }
44
45 bool trap_on_abort() const { return trap_on_abort_; }
46
47 bool should_abort_hard() const { return hard_abort_; }
48 void set_abort_hard(bool v) { hard_abort_ = v; }
49
50 void set_builtin(Builtin builtin) { maybe_builtin_ = builtin; }
51 Builtin builtin() const { return maybe_builtin_; }
52
53 void set_has_frame(bool v) { has_frame_ = v; }
54 bool has_frame() const { return has_frame_; }
55
56 // Loads the given constant or external reference without embedding its direct
57 // pointer. The produced code is isolate-independent.
58 void IndirectLoadConstant(Register destination, Handle<HeapObject> object);
59 void IndirectLoadExternalReference(Register destination,
60 ExternalReference reference);
61
62 Address BuiltinEntry(Builtin builtin);
63
64 virtual void LoadFromConstantsTable(Register destination,
65 int constant_index) = 0;
66
67 // Corresponds to: destination = kRootRegister + offset.
68 virtual void LoadRootRegisterOffset(Register destination,
69 intptr_t offset) = 0;
70
71 // Corresponds to: destination = [kRootRegister + offset].
72 virtual void LoadRootRelative(Register destination, int32_t offset) = 0;
73 virtual void StoreRootRelative(int32_t offset, Register value) = 0;
74
75 static constexpr bool CanBeImmediate(RootIndex index) {
76 return V8_STATIC_ROOTS_BOOL && RootsTable::IsReadOnly(index);
77 }
78 Tagged_t ReadOnlyRootPtr(RootIndex index);
79 static Tagged_t ReadOnlyRootPtr(RootIndex index, Isolate* isolate);
80 virtual void LoadRoot(Register destination, RootIndex index) = 0;
81
82 static int32_t RootRegisterOffsetForRootIndex(RootIndex root_index);
83 static int32_t RootRegisterOffsetForBuiltin(Builtin builtin);
84
85 // Returns the root-relative offset to reference.address().
86 static intptr_t RootRegisterOffsetForExternalReference(
87 Isolate* isolate, const ExternalReference& reference);
88
89 // Returns the root-relative offset to the external reference table entry,
90 // which itself contains reference.address().
91 static int32_t RootRegisterOffsetForExternalReferenceTableEntry(
92 Isolate* isolate, const ExternalReference& reference);
93
94 // An address is addressable through kRootRegister if it is located within
95 // isolate->root_register_addressable_region().
96 static bool IsAddressableThroughRootRegister(
97 Isolate* isolate, const ExternalReference& reference);
98
99#if defined(V8_TARGET_OS_WIN) || defined(V8_TARGET_OS_MACOS)
100 // Minimum page size. We must touch memory once per page when expanding the
101 // stack, to avoid access violations.
102 static constexpr int kStackPageSize = 4 * KB;
103#endif
104
105 V8_INLINE std::string CommentForOffHeapTrampoline(const char* prefix,
106 Builtin builtin) {
107 if (!v8_flags.code_comments) return "";
108 std::ostringstream str;
109 str << "Inlined Trampoline for " << prefix << " to "
110 << Builtins::name(builtin);
111 return str.str();
112 }
113
114 enum class RecordWriteCallMode { kDefault, kWasm };
115
116 protected:
117 Isolate* const isolate_ = nullptr;
118
119 // This handle will be patched with the code object on installation.
120 Handle<HeapObject> code_object_;
121
122 // Whether kRootRegister has been initialized.
123 bool root_array_available_ = true;
124
125 // Immediately trap instead of calling {Abort} when debug code fails.
126 bool trap_on_abort_ = v8_flags.trap_on_abort;
127
128 // Emit a C call to abort instead of a runtime call.
129 bool hard_abort_ = false;
130
131 // May be set while generating builtins.
132 Builtin maybe_builtin_ = Builtin::kNoBuiltinId;
133
134 bool has_frame_ = false;
135
136 int comment_depth_ = 0;
137
138 DISALLOW_IMPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS(MacroAssemblerBase);
139};
140
141// Avoids emitting calls to the {Builtin::kAbort} builtin when emitting
142// debug code during the lifetime of this scope object.
143class V8_NODISCARD HardAbortScope {
144 public:
145 explicit HardAbortScope(MacroAssemblerBase* assembler)
146 : assembler_(assembler), old_value_(assembler->should_abort_hard()) {
147 assembler_->set_abort_hard(true);
148 }
149 ~HardAbortScope() { assembler_->set_abort_hard(old_value_); }
150
151 private:
152 MacroAssemblerBase* assembler_;
153 bool old_value_;
154};
155
156} // namespace internal
157} // namespace v8
158
159#endif // V8_CODEGEN_MACRO_ASSEMBLER_BASE_H_
